tasks.task: Engage in community agricultural support and infrastructure development in response to drought.
subtasks: Organize farmers into water use associations.
Harness local and international resources (e.g., FAO's drip irrigation technology) for food security.
Encourage surplus revenue reinvestment into community projects.
Manage water distribution to mitigate drought effects.
Promote efficient water use in agriculture.
Enable farmers to diversify income sources.
Support consumption and affordability of food through economic measures.
Raise awareness about the impact of El Nino on crop losses.
Highlight the importance of local and external assistance.
Encourage community engagement in food production and distribution.
